root: ^Hey there, sweetheart! Step right into our brand-spankin' new emporium of elegance and craftsmanship!
^Welcome to the one and only Jerry's De Pot!
^We've got the finest selection of pots and vases this side of the universe, and let me tell you, you won't find a sweeter deal anywhere else!
^Eh? Of course I'd love to help you find your son! There's just one problem...
^Look, we've had a little mishap here involving a monkey and some geese... It's a long story.
^The important part is that there are a bunch of broken pots around - and we can't have that at Jerry's De Pot, no sir!
^If you could do me a solid and help tidy up the mess, I might just be able to help you out.
